scripts.super-clean: cd firebase && npm run clean && cd .. && rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf */node_modules && rm -rf */*/node_modules && npm run clean -ws --if-present
scripts.dev:prep: npm run clean:logs && cd firebase && npm run clean && cd .. && npm run build
scripts.dev: npm run dev:prep && concurrently "cd webapp-v2 && npm run watch" "cd firebase && npm run link-webapp && npm run start-emulators"
scripts.test:unit: npm run test:unit -w webapp-v2 && npm run test:unit -w firebase/functions && npm run test:unit -w test-support && npm run test:unit -w e2e-tests
scripts.test:integration: npm run test:integration -w webapp-v2 && npm run test:integration -w firebase/functions && npm run test:integration -w test-support && npm run test:integration -w e2e-tests
scripts.postinstall: cd e2e-tests && npx playwright install chromium
